name: Plugin Name: Simplify Post Taxonomy
author: Sourav Mondal

sections.description:
In many projects and sites we need to built custom posts types and need to create custom taxonomy to implement the business logic properly.
This plugins helps to create custom post types and Taxonomies and relate them without writing a single line of code.
A beautiful Dashbaord Section Interface is provided to do the works.

Author Email: souravmondal10@gmail.com
Author Website: http://souravmondal.co.in
Features

  • Easy to Install.
  • very lightweight.
  • User friendly interface in admin panel.

Notes

*If you face any problem or find any bugs ,then please let me know.I will fix that.You cooperation is expected.
sections.installation:
Normal installation

  1. Download the simplify-post-taxonomy.zip file to your computer.
  2. Unzip the file.
  3. Upload the simplify-post-taxonomy directory to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  4. Activate the plugins through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

That’s it. You will find a menu “custom posts” in dashboard.

short_description: Use this plugin to create custom post types and custom taxonomy.Don't need to write codes any more.Pure WordPress standard followed.
